channel.title: Pi how to add a npc that removes and gives item
channel.description: i want to make a store for comp cape where i need multiple items for it to be gotten but i dont know how so i was wondering or any1 could help me make that

item.title: Pi how to add a npc that removes and gives item
item.dc:creator: @DreamCream DreamCream
item.description:
@DreamCream wrote:

case 945: // RuneScape Guide
if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 0) {
c.sendMessage("You need atleast 1 free slot.");
} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 5000000)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 5000000);
c.getItems().addItem(20748, 1);
c.sendMessage("You buy the Completionist cape");
} else {
c.sendMessage("You need more money to buy a Completionist cape");
break;

Stick to 317’s before you hop onto 600+'s…
This is pretty simple…
